input: Summary: Aspiring Software Engineer with 1.5 years of software development experience, skilled in building scalable solutions and optimizing performance. Passionate about problem-solving, agile methodologies, scalability and system design. Seeking to leverage software development expertise to deliver impactful solutions.

Skills:
Languages and Frameworks: Python, Core Java, Java Servlets, Langchain, Flask, SQL, NoSQL, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JDBC, Maven, Apache Tomcat, REST, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, ReactJS, TypeScript, ExpressJS, NodeJS, Data Structures and Algorithms
Tools: Eclipse, VS Code, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker, Git, Jenkins, Junit, Jira, Prometheus, Grafana, OpenAI API, Twilio API, Microsoft Word, Excel, Access, Outlook

Software Developer at Capgemini in Bengaluru, India (January 2023 - June 2023): Developed a full-stack fitness and gym platform using the MERN stack with Twilio OTP authentication. Implemented real-time gym booking system and workout recommendation engine. Built and optimized RESTful APIs and improved UI/UX using React.js and Tailwind CSS. Followed Agile methodologies, code reviews, and team collaboration. Project assessed by Capgemini professionals as part of final year project.

Research Intern at La Trobe University in Melbourne, Australia - Remote (July 2021 - June 2022): Built a Dashboard with Prometheus and Grafana using Python. Worked on blockchain and IoT consensus mechanism with 95% uptime and 20% efficiency boost.

Project: SmartNest (August 2024 - December 2024): Built a Smart Home management app with ReactJS frontend and Java Servlets backend. Implemented AI agents using LangChain and GPT-4o-mini. Used MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, Elasticsearch, and RAG-based search for backend. Designed multi-role auth system and integrated Message Queues.

Project: Cuisine Connect (September 2024 - December 2024): Built AI chatbot for food ordering with ReactJS frontend and Flask backend. Integrated OpenAI and LangChain agents for refund handling and fraud detection.
Education at Illinois Institute of Technology in Chicago, IL (August 2023 - May 2025): Master's in Computer Science
Education at Presidency University in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India (August 2019 - June 2023): Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
